info.name: 1 api1.3cx.eu
info.description:
## 3CX Phone 18 API documentation

See also [https://creomate.com/3cx-webapi/](https://creomate.com/3cx-webapi/)

**AuthKeys.csv** - a text file for creating API key access for incoming requests

Example:

```
key;email;name;access
JNJP5UqGDhX89ue2POsb1Kto;support@creomate.com;Creatio;full
np88bAodJl;zendesk@creomate.com;Zendesk;full

 ```

item.name: Create Custom DB Operator state history
Get the current number of calls
Get a list of all external lines (paths)
Get a list of all user extensions
Get a list of registered user extensions
Get a list of ring groups
Get a list of extension group (Debian only)
Get a free ring group members
SQL API 3CX DB Real missed list
SQL API 3CX DB Count Real missed list

body.raw:
{"query":"SELECT min (segment_start_time), src_caller_number, count (*) as count1 FROM public.call_history_view where src_external = true and segment_start_time > '2022-06-09 11:19:51+00' group by src_caller_number having count(*) = 1;",
"count":"100"}

item.name: SQL API 3CX DB Unsuccessful outoging calls

body.raw:
{"query":"SELECT * FROM public.operator_state_history order by date desc;",
"count":"10",
"db_name":"user_state"
}

{"query":"select ext as Ext, new_values as Status, to_char((EXTRACT( EPOCH FROM (NOW() - date)) * interval '1 sec')::interval, 'HH24:MI:SS' ) as TimeInStatus from( select date, old_values, new_values, ext, NOW() as datefinish from (SELECT date, old_values, new_values, ext, (select date from public.operator_state_history as tt where tt.ext=maint.ext and tt.date>maint.date order by date asc limit 1 ) as DateFinish FROM public.operator_state_history as maint order by date asc) as t3 where datefinish is null) as t4 order by Ext asc",
"count":"100",
"db_name":"user_state"
}

{"query":"DROP TABLE public.operator_state_history;",
"count":"10",
"db_name":"user_state"
}

{"query":"SELECT * FROM public.webhook_history order by date desc;",
"count":"10",
"db_name":"user_state"
}
